data.text: @GlanCleaning Hi there. British Airways have experienced a technical issue which we are supporting them to resolve. We would recommend checking your flight with your airline before travelling to the airport: https://t.co/mYR3JWNSFM

@EverDawne Hi there. We are sorry to hear about your journey so far, British Airways have experienced a technical issue which we are supporting them to resolve. We would recommend checking your flight with your airline before travelling to the airport: https://t.co/O06JbmeDfZ
@HeathrowAirport Ok, so what is happening with @British_Airways today?
@HeathrowAirport Severe disruption this morning at Heathrow, flights from BA are all being cancelled ? any reasons?
